001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model;
002
003import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.entity.User;
005
006/**
007 * Encapsulates the data and logic for shots fired during the game.
008 */
009public class Shot {
010
011  @Expose(serialize = true, deserialize = false)
012  private final User toUser;
013
014  @Expose
015  private final int x;
016
017  @Expose
018  private final int y;
019
020  @Expose
021  private final boolean hit;
022
023  /**
024   * Initializes final fields in absence of Gson initialization.
025   *
026   * @param toUser User who is being fired at.
027   * @param x      X coordinate of where on the grid the shot is being fired.
028   * @param y      Y coordinate of where on the grid the shot is being fired.
029   * @param hit  Indicates if a shot has hit a ship.
030   */
031  public Shot(User toUser, int x, int y, boolean hit) {
032    this.toUser = toUser;
033    this.x = x;
034    this.y = y;
035    this.hit = hit;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Gets the X coordinate of where on the grid the shot is being fired.
040   */
041  public int getX() {
042    return x;
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Gets the Y coordinate of where in the grid the shot is being fired.
047   */
048  public int getY() {
049    return y;
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Gets the {@link User} object who is being fired at.
054   */
055  public User getToUser() {
056    return toUser;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Gets the boolean flag indicating whether a shot has hit a ship.
061   */
062  public boolean isHit() {
063    return hit;
064  }
065}
